meanings.sent1: The boring parts of the movie were skippable.
meanings.sent2: The optional side quest in the game was skippable.
meanings.sent3: The long lecture on history was so skippable, I almost fell asleep.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was so clear that the extra details were skippable.
meanings.sent5: The unnecessary steps in the recipe were definitely skippable.

meanings.definition: Capable of being passed over or ignored
meanings.sent1: The skippable ads on the website were annoying.
meanings.sent2: The skippable chapters in the book didn't add much to the story.
meanings.sent3: The skippable commercials during the show made us laugh more than the actual program.
meanings.sent4: His skippable comments during the meeting were quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The skippable tasks on the to-do list were a relief to ignore.
